package_info.mp_subtitle: The module that handles the display of websites.
package_info.mp_description:
This module is essential in order to display a website.
It is literally the front office the platform. It is used to render the pages from their pageId and templates.
It is also used by MelisCms to display the page's edition mode in MelisCms.
This module also brings all the default plugin used to contruct a template such as:
- tags plugins (wysiwyg edition)
- breadcrumb plugin
- menu plugin
- folder listing
- search engine
